title: Glacier Bay National Park & Preserve: Typical Cruise Ship Route
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Glacier Bay by Boat     Visit on a Cruise Ship     Typical Cruise Ship Route                  Typical Cruise Ship Route in Glacier Bay          Most cruise ships spend a full day in the park, traveling over 120 miles, and enjoy a full hour at the face of a tidewater glacier. NPS
